history.content:
Evening with Industry is a networking event hosted by SWE (Society of Women Engineers) which aims to connect students with representatives from companies of various STEM-related fields. This year, the event will be taking place on Zoom, where you'll get a chance to have small group and one on one conversations with 60+ company representatives and over 20 companies (including Uber, Rivian, Bloomberg, and many more).

Evening with Industry is the perfect place to start your search for an internship, a full-time job, or even explore your options!Mark your calendars for Wednesday, October 6th, 4-6 PM PT! Evening with Industry is open to all Berkeley students, and companies are hiring internship & full-time from ALL engineering majors.

Purchase your tickets here: https://tinyurl.com/SWE2021EWI or find more details on our Facebook event: https://www.facebook.com/events/1283675935426976/

If financial support is needed to buy a ticket, please email hanameroth@berkeley.edu. We hope to see you there!
history.subject: Get Tickets for Evening with Industry!
